info.title: E-ComMercy API
info.description:
Generic ecommerce API design for Backend course on Coderhouse
_create by Allan Reynoso_
[Github /AllanNara](https://github.com/AllanNara)

tags.name: carts
tags.description: CRUD operations of the user carts

post.description: Add new product with unique code

get.description: Return one product, find by ID

put.description: Update properties of product, find by ID
Update entire user cart, with products in body

delete.description: Clean all products from cart with a specific id

post.description: Add existing product to user cart

put.description: Update quantity of specific cart product

delete.description: Delete specific product from user cart

example.title: Scallops - 10/20
example.description: Maecenas tristique  est et tempus semper  est quam pharetra magna  ac consequat metus sapien ut nunc. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae; Mauris viverra diam vitae quam. Suspendisse potenti.Nullam porttitor lacus at turpis. Donec posuere metus vitae ipsum. Aliquam non mauris.

product.description: Maecenas tristique  est et tempus semper  est quam pharetra magna  ac consequat metus sapien ut nunc. Vestibulum Nullam porttitor lacus at turpis.

NewProduct.description: Fields to complete for new product, code must unique

PaginationRes.description: Get all products with pagination system

CartOrProductNotFound.description: The specified resource was not found

CartNotFound.description: The specified cart was not found

ProductNotFound.description: The specified product was not found
